source.5414738e:
# Downloading and installing PIP upgrade
!pip install --upgrade pip==20.2.3
!pip download -d /kaggle/working pip==20.2.3

source.c6fe500c:
# Downloading all requirements to l5kit
!pip uninstall typing --yes
!pip wheel --prefer-binary -w /kaggle/working -f /kaggle/working -r /kaggle/working/requirements.txt
source.8cd4d1fe: For Kaggle GPU docker image (with Cuda 10.1) we'll have to wheel `torch` and `torchvision` differently
